metadata.title: CVE-2020-15169 rubygem-activeview: Cross-site scripting in translation helpers (low)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in rubygem-actionview in versions prior to 5.2.4.4 and 6.0.3.3. When an HTML-unsafe string is passed as the default for a missing  translation key, the default string is incorrectly marked as HTML-safe and not escaped. Thie highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity.
            STATEMENT: Red Hat CloudForms and Red Hat Satellite 6 ships affected ActiveView RubyGem, however, those are not vulnerable since product code do not use such unsafe implementation.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
tfm-ror52-rubygem-rails is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
